pkgmetadata.longdescription: ArcGIS Utility Functions // Developer oriented utility functions designed to be used as the building blocks of R packages that work with ArcGIS Location Services. It provides functionality for authorization, Esri JSON construction and parsing, as well as other utilities pertaining to geometry and Esri type conversions. To support 'ArcGIS Pro' users, authorization can done via 'arcgisbinding'. Installation instructions for 'arcgisbinding' can be found at https://r.esri.com/r-bridge- site/arcgisbinding/installing-arcgisbinding.html.
